effect.gold_silver: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to make each target flinch. If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.
effect.crystal: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to make each target flinch. If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.

short_effect.gold_silver: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.
short_effect.crystal: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.

flavor_text.gold_silver: Whips up a tornado to attack.
flavor_text.crystal: Whips up a tornado to attack.
